shortDescription: Astonishing bundler using rollup and swc
longDescription: Rosepack is a bundler that uses rollup and swc to bundle your code. It is fast and easy to use.

features.name: Multi format
features.description: Rosepack can bundle your code into all formats rollup supports.

features.name: Generate declaration
features.description: Rosepack can generate declaration files for your code.

features.name: Fast Compilation
features.description: Rosepack leverages swc to speed up the compilation process.
